column4: did install ubuntu 10.10 without windows all, the entire disk for ubuntu and I got error when I boot :(
Did the install complete ok and what error do you get ?
disk not found or something like that . Grub rescue>
it doesn't boot
Then grub didnt install correctly. Did you use many partitions in custom mode ?
You need to boot rescue mode and then edit /etc/grub/grub.conf "hd (x.x)" so that it points to the correct partition and then reboot
Thats /boot/grub/grub.conf or so.
with live cd?
Thats /boot/grub/menu. will also be ok to edit.
You can do that from the original
Scary isnt it, just a black thing that wont boot :) ... Generally its very easy.
yeah blank thing thatit says.... "grub rescue>"
type help... you can edit the grub startup commands and then boot also.
Basically you just need to use kernel /boot/ [TAB_HERE]. It was so long since i did it but i think that will do it
tell me what to do step by step, please I would really appreciate it
first...
I wish i could, but i dont have another computer to simulate the failure on. Let me know what goes on and ill try to help as much as possible.
Im sure others will pitch in as well..
before it was winxp pro installed
